xpaths.hint: You need three note elements.
You need three attributes on the first note (@pname, @oct, and @dur).
You need three attributes on the second note (@pname, @oct, and @dur).
You need three attributes on the third note (@pname, @oct, and @dur).
The @pname attribute allows values from 'a' to 'g'.
The @oct attribute requires integers.
The @dur attribute allows values such as '1', '2', '4', '8'…
